segments.text: Welcome ! Welcome to Little Italy . We're the most Italian family here !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So I've heard . That's why I'm having such a great time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If I hadn't married an Italian man , I probably wouldn't be pregnant so often . And maybe I could raise pigs instead of bambinos !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Huh ? Um ... well , it's nice to see that some people still have big families .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is nice , but it would be nicer if my macho husband would get off his tush and help me . Ha-ha ... Have this . It's from Italy !
segments.speaker: S1
